title: Elegant serif...
content:
Hello, does anyone recognise this or similar?...

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150418093057im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Vanhan_6428.jpg)

comments.content:
It looks like **[Linotype Didot Small Caps](http://web.archive.org/web/20150418093057/http:/www.findmyfont.com/index.php/fonts/font-preview?fset=Adobe&ffam=Linotype%20Didot%20Small%20Caps%20%26%20Old%20-%20Roman&fid=5d458f4a80dc78b1f7155b93547d58de&fsize=60&text=VanHan&fit=1)** (or artificial small caps) somehow expanded...

------------------  
I found it using "Find my Font": [http://www.findmyfont.com](http://web.archive.org/web/20150418093057/http:/www.findmyfont.com/ "http://www.findmyfont.com")
